item.title: Venezuela frees 104 political prisoners, rights group says
item.description: A human rights lawyer and a communications student are among those freed, Caracas-based Foro Penal says.

item.title: Venezuela frees dozens of political prisoners, human rights group says
item.description: It is the latest batch of detainees freed since the US seized Venezuelan President Nicol√°s Maduro in a raid.

item.title: Iran accused of sex assaults on teenage prisoners, while families charged to recover remains of loved ones
item.description: Iran's prosecutor general Mohammad Movahedi claims government crushed nationwide protests as death toll reaches 544 with over 10,681 arrested.
